mapper.select: SELECT r.id, salary, recruit_people_num , recruit_type, description, publish_date , apply_people_num, browse_count, CONCAT(p.name, e.name) AS publisherName , f.name AS foodTypeName, j.name AS jobName, education , experience_require, age_require FROM recruit r LEFT JOIN proxy p ON r.publisher_id = p.id LEFT JOIN enterprise e ON e.id = r.publisher_id INNER JOIN food_type f ON f.id = r.food_type_id INNER JOIN job j ON j.id = r.job_id
